mapper.sql: id, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, user_id AS userId, balance, used_margin AS usedMargin, dynamic_balance AS dynamicBalance, total_enter AS totalEnter, total_exit AS totalExit, product_type AS productType, version
mapper.select: SELECT b.id,b.user_id AS userId,b.balance,b.used_margin as usedMargin,b.product_type AS productType FROM g_beta_account b INNER JOIN( SELECT c.account_type FROM t_account_manage_config t INNER JOIN t_account_manage m ON m.id = t.account_id INNER JOIN t_account_config c ON c.id = t.account_config_id WHERE m.`name` = 'beta账户' AND t.status = 1 ) a ON a.account_type = b.product_type WHERE b.user_id = #{userId}
